function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete deployment of policy actions in different localities","Impact":"Higher baseline growth rate of infections in localities","Mitigation":"Ensure full deployment of policy actions in all localities","Technologies":"Policy tracking and monitoring systems","People":"Local authorities, policymakers","Owner":"Local authorities, government"},{"Description":"Transient responses to policies in different countries","Impact":"Varying effectiveness of policies in different time frames and locations","Mitigation":"Adapt policy implementation based on temporal dynamics and location-specific factors","Technologies":"Data analytics, predictive modeling","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of data for estimating temporal dynamics of policy effects in some countries","Impact":"Inability to accurately estimate the impact of policies on infection growth rates","Mitigation":"Improve data collection and reporting systems in countries with limited data","Technologies":"Data collection and reporting tools, data sharing platforms","People":"Public health agencies, government agencies","Owner":"Health organizations, government"}]}
